CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1945, pg. 23, reads: "First Timers -- The faithful came out en masse on Christmas Eve to be on hand for the official opening of the Continental Bar in Crawford Grill No. 2 [1]. Bottom: A crowd of merry-makers put the okay stamp on the new room." --Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group, including Dolores Thompson Slater, Mildred "Pinky" Greenway, Mary Louise Harris Lewis, and Charles Lewis in front, with William "Woogie" Harris, Robert E."Pappy" Williams, and Helen in back, gathered in Continental Bar at Crawford Grill No. 1
